features.sectionDesc: A comprehensive healthcare service tailored to your modern lifestyle — anytime, anywhere.

item1.title: Video Consultations
item1.description: Connect with doctors 24/7 through high-quality video calls.

item2.title: Smart Scheduling
item2.description: AI-powered appointment scheduling, calendar integration, and automatic reminders.

item3.title: Monitor your health
item3.description: Tracking vital signs, symptoms, and medications.

item4.title: E-pharmacy
item4.description: Order prescriptions, set reminders, and view medication history.

item5.title: Secure & Private
item5.description: HIPAA-compliant platform with end-to-end encryption and biometric security.

item6.title: Family Care
item6.description: Manage healthcare for your entire family with shared profiles and records.
